name: Auto-Sync Work/Home
description: Automatically sync changes between work and home computers

hooks.name: Pull Latest Changes Before Work
hooks.description: Run this when starting work to get latest changes

hooks.name: Push Changes After Work
hooks.command: git add . && git commit -m 'Auto-sync: $(date)' && git push origin main
hooks.description: Run this when ending work session to sync changes

hooks.name: Auto-Commit on File Save
hooks.command: git add . && git commit -m 'Auto-save: Updated files' --allow-empty
hooks.description: Automatically commits changes when you save files
